Dialogue.Page: IRE: This is Icy Ridges East Settlement, do you read me Ravenous Tides Settlement?
RT: Reading you loud and clear Icy Ridges East Settlement!
IRE: We have an emergency situation in the west settlement, a tornado has touched down right in the middle of the settlement!
IRE: We've sent Minnow and a rescue crew to help with evacuation, but we could really use some extra help!
RT: What's the extent of the damage?
IRE: Extreme, there are multiple large fires, and the weather is making landing difficult!
RT: We're sending Bass and a rescue crew to help with rescue, and Sunfish and their ship will stay nearby on reserve.
RT: Keep us posted if the situation changes, Icy Ridges East Settlement. Ravenous Tides Settlement out.
IRE: Thanks for the help Ravenous Tides Settlement. Icy Ridges East Settlement out.
